dict.string: SkipTrack uses Bluetooth to connect to your AirPods for enhanced workout tracking and jump counting.
SkipTrack uses Bluetooth to connect to your AirPods for enhanced workout tracking and jump counting.
SkipTrack uses the microphone to detect audio cues from your AirPods during workouts.
SkipTrack uses motion sensors to automatically count your jump rope jumps during workouts.
